questions.question: Who was the king in the story?
questions.answer: The king was the husband of the beautiful queen.

questions.question: What did God bless the royal couple with?
questions.answer: God gave them a little daughter.

questions.question: Why was there great rejoicing in the city and country?
questions.answer: The people wished the king all that was good because he was kind and just.

questions.question: Who entered the room while the child was in its cradle?
questions.answer: A strange-looking old woman entered the room.

questions.question: What warning did the old woman give about the princess?
questions.answer: She must not be allowed out under the open sky until she was fifteen years old or else the mountain troll would fetch her.

questions.question: How did the king react to the warning?
questions.answer: He posted guards to watch over the little princess.
